messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the writers on this list was (no subject)
messages.msgSnippet: ... I remember that issue!  I get mine weeks after everybody else because mail is so slow here, so I had already managed to forget that you all had articles in
messages.messageBody:
6/7/03 18:19:

> Well, the only article I've had published in HEM was in the same issue as one
> of yours Rue, and now Pandora's box too? Cool!
>
> Ren

I remember that issue! I get mine weeks after everybody else because mail
is so slow here, so I had already managed to forget that you all had
articles in it. But it was so cool, turning the pages, and there was Rue,
and Ren, and Sandra, and a whole cool magazine worth of people that I sorta
kinda knew.

It was fun.

brenda
